name: Gold Hunt (MrBlibb)
description:
Gold hunt is a game that you need to find chests and they drop gold if you found all the gold you get to the next level! W S A D and SPACE for movement! 3D

UPDATE : Funmode its just soo fun if you hold left shift your movement get crazy so like 10x speed and jump power! and you can play with shapes and more!

Sub to my youtube: MrBlibb Thanks! <3
